meanings.definition: A plural noun meaning a type of butterfly.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful leps fluttering around.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful leps resting on a flower.
meanings.sent3: The leps seemed to be having a dance party on the flowers.
meanings.sent4: The leps in the garden were like delicate pieces of flying art.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the leps flying gracefully in the air.

meanings.definition: A verb meaning to jump or spring suddenly.
meanings.sent1: The cat made a leps to catch the mouse.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's leps helped him win the race.
meanings.sent3: The leps of the frog surprised the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her heart made a leps when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The leps of the kangaroo was impressive to watch.

meanings.definition: An adjective meaning having a lobe or lobes.
meanings.sent1: The leps leaf had a unique shape.
meanings.sent2: She admired the leps design of the earrings.
meanings.sent3: The leps pattern on the fabric was eye-catching.
meanings.sent4: The leps edges of the mushroom made it easy to identify.
meanings.sent5: The leps shape of the seashell fascinated the children.
